trans-unit.resname: CMR·2 | Akroma, Vision of Ixidor | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each combat, until end of turn, each other creature you control gets +1/+1 if it has flying, +1/+1 if it has first strike, and so on for double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, vigilance, and partner.
trans-unit.target: 在每次战斗开始时，对每个由你操控的其他生物而言，它每具有飞行、先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、保护、延势、践踏、警戒与拍档等十二种异能中的一种，便得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Scry 3, then reveal the top card of your library. Draw cards equal to that card's converted mana cost. (To scry 3, look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

trans-unit.resname: CMR·211 | Wheel of Misfortune | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 厄运之轮

trans-unit.resname: CMR·211 | Wheel of Misfortune | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player secretly chooses a number 0 or greater, then all players reveal those numbers simultaneously and determine the highest and lowest numbers revealed this way. CARDNAME deals damage equal to the highest number to each player who chose that number. Each player who didn't choose the lowest number discards their hand, then draws seven cards.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各私下选择一个等于或大于0的数字，然后所有牌手同时展示所选数字，并决定以此法展示之各数字中的最大值和最小值。厄运之轮对每位所选数字是最大值的牌手各造成等同于该数量的伤害。每位所选数字不是最小值的牌手弃掉其手牌，然后各抓七张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·542 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to that card's converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的忍者对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，展示你的牌库顶牌，并将该牌置于你手上。每位对手各失去等同于该牌之总法术力费用的生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·593 | Captain Vargus Wrath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, Pirates you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each time you've cast a commander from the command zone this game.
trans-unit.target: 每当瓦格拉斯船长攻击时，你本盘游戏中每从统帅区施放过一次指挥官，由你操控的海盗便得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·594 | Colfenor, the Last Yew | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 末代紫杉柯芬诺

trans-unit.resname: CMR·594 | Colfenor, the Last Yew | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 警戒，延势

trans-unit.resname: CMR·594 | Colfenor, the Last Yew | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another creature you control dies, return up to one other target creature card with lesser toughness from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当末代紫杉柯芬诺或另一个由你操控的生物死去时，将至多另一张目标防御力小于前述生物的生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·595 | Ghen, Arcanum Weaver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {R}{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice an enchantment: Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {R}{W}{B}，{T}，牺牲一个结界：将目标结界牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Choose one. X is the number of spells you've cast this turn.

trans-unit.target: •你获得X点生命。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·597 | Gor Muldrak, Amphinologist | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMR·597 | Gor Muldrak, Amphinologist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You and permanents you control have protection from Salamanders.
trans-unit.target: 你和由你操控的永久物具有反火蜥蜴保护异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·597 | Gor Muldrak, Amphinologist | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, each player who controls the fewest creatures creates a 4/3 blue Salamander Warrior creature token.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，每位操控生物数量为所有牌手中最少者的牌手各派出一个4/3蓝色火蜥蜴／战士衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·598 | Hamza, Guardian of Arashin | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMR·598 | Hamza, Guardian of Arashin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个其上有+1/+1指示物的生物，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·598 | Hamza, Guardian of Arashin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 你每操控一个其上有+1/+1指示物的生物，你施放的生物咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·599 | Hans Eriksson | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 汉斯艾力克森

trans-unit.resname: CMR·599 | Hans Eriksson | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield tapped and attacking defending player or a planeswalker they control. Otherwise, put that card into your hand. When you put a creature card onto the battlefield this way, it fights CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当汉斯艾力克森攻击时，展示你的牌库顶牌。若它是生物牌，则将之横置放进战场，且正向防御牌手或任一由其操控的鹏洛客进行攻击。若否，则将该牌置于你手上。当你以此法将生物牌放进战场时，它与汉斯艾力克森互斗。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·600 | Imoti, Celebrant of Bounty | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 恩赐主祭依莫提

trans-unit.resname: CMR·600 | Imoti, Celebrant of Bounty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 倾曳（当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比此咒语低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: CMR·600 | Imoti, Celebrant of Bounty | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Spells you cast with converted mana cost 6 or greater have cascade.
trans-unit.target: 你施放之总法术力费用等于或大于6的咒语具有倾曳异能。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·601 | Jared Carthalion, True Heir | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: CMR·601 | Jared Carthalion, True Heir | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent becomes the monarch. You can't become the monarch this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当正统传人贾瑞卡萨隆进战场时，目标对手成为君主。本回合中，你不能成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·601 | Jared Carthalion, True Heir | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If damage would be dealt to Jared Carthalion while you're the monarch, prevent that damage and put that many +1/+1 counters on it.
trans-unit.target: 如果贾瑞卡萨隆于你是君主时将受到伤害，则防止该伤害，并在其上放置等量的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·602 | Juri, Master of the Revue | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当你牺牲一个永久物时，在剧团业主裘里上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·602 | Juri, Master of the Revue | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Juri dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.
trans-unit.target: 当裘里死去时，它对任意一个目标造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

trans-unit.target: 每当护天坎鴶攻击时，进行攻击且具飞行异能的生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: CMR·603 | Kangee, Sky Warden | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Kangee blocks, blocking creatures with flying get +0/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当坎鴶阻挡时，进行阻挡且具飞行异能的生物得+0/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: {T}: The player whose turn it is may end the turn. (Exile all spells and abilities from the stack. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage wears off, and "this turn" and "until end of turn" effects end.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：轮到此回合的牌手可以结束本回合。（放逐堆叠上的所有咒语和异能。轮到此回合的牌手将手牌弃至其手牌上限。生物上的伤害消失，并且注记着「本回合」与「直到回合结束」的效应均结束。）
